articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.title: Microsoft hangs up on Skype: service to shut down May 5, 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft is retiring Skype from active duty 14 years after acquiring it, with users given nine weeks to decide their next move.
articles.content: After kickstarting the market for making calls over the internet 23 years ago, Skype is closing down. Microsoft, which acquired the messaging and calling app 14 years ago, said it will be retiring it… [+8151 chars]
